content: the pattern is available for free on my blog > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 1 ** **about the pattern** this beautiful ripple crochet baby blanket pattern will be the perfect baby shower gift the gentle ripple texture will work with any color which makes this crochet pattern a neutral crochet baby blanket if you want to make this blanket larger you can follow the stitch multiple instructions in the notes section **skill level** - intermediate **crochet terminology** - the pattern is written using english u s terminology **materials needed** - hooks size needed 4 5 mm - the project is crocheted with worsted #4 weight cotton yarn i used knit picks - mighty stitch - total amount of yarn needed 700gr/1 331m/1 456yds - 4 stitch markers optional **finished size** - 30x35 76x89cm ** you can choose to make the pattern as a rectangle or a square and work it as big as you d like if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2025 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this design are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design this pdf pattern is free from viruses and safe to use it includes links to reputable websites however users should exercise caution when accessing external links from unknown sources gpsr representative ciara doyle c15 y5f9 ireland ciara@thefairythorn ie 1 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
